name: Hyperdimensional Knight
description:
Entry for Godot Wild Jam XI. Theme was Parallel Dimensions. There is a typo in the illustration above XD.

OBJECTIVE:

Kill all the waves of enemies to attain a high score. When 10 points reached choose an upgrade. You can swap dimensions to make appear new platforms and disappear some, grab pickups for your health and bullets also maybe you can use dimension swap to kill some enemies.

CONTROLS:

In Game:

MOVE LEFTLeft arrowLeft d-pad or Left stick leftMOVE RIGHTRight arrowRight d-pad or Left stick rightJUMPUp arrowPs Cross, Xbox A, Nintendo BSHOOTZR, R1PUNCHXL, L1SWAP DIMENSIONSSpacePs Circle, Xbox B, Nintendo A

Others:

NAVIGATE MENUSArrows/D-pad/Left stickCONFIRMZ or Ps Cross, Xbox A, Nintendo BCANCELX or Ps Circle, Xbox B, Nintendo A
